Package org.jvault.factory.buildinfo

Class AnnotationVaultFactoryBuildInfo

java.lang.Object
org.jvault.factory.buildinfo.AnnotationVaultFactoryBuildInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
VaultFactoryBuildInfoExtensiblePoint
@API public final class AnnotationVaultFactoryBuildInfo extends Object implements VaultFactoryBuildInfoExtensiblePoint
A class that reads the BeanWire marking information of the class marked with BeanArea and returns the BuildInfo method.

Thrown InvalidAnnotationConfigClassException if an unmarked BeanArea parameter is passed to the constructor.
Since:
0.1
See Also:
  • BeanArea
  • BeanWire
  • InvalidAnnotationConfigClassException

      It reads the field information marked with BeanWire and generates the return information of the method.
